line_1: How then, beneath its load of Flesh
line_2: And how the Friendly Hand she'd bless

line_1: His characters are all in flesh,
line_2: Their hands are fair, their faces fresh;

line_1: But lest she in the walk should lose her Flesh,
line_2: And not appear, for Sale, so full and fresh,

line_1: Might I, but ah, while clogg'd with sinful Flesh,
line_2: In vain I breath out the impatient Wish!

line_1: Might I, but ah, while clogg'd with sinful Flesh,
line_2: But have a glimpse of those fair Fields of Bliss,
